name: DosQ
storyline:
You're working on your company and-- OH NO, THE COMPANY HAS BEEN HACKED. 
Use your tools and lock all the sectors before it's too late.
summary:
You're working on your company and-- OH NO, THE COMPANY HAS BEEN HACKED. 
Use your tools and lock all the sectors before it's too late. 
 
Q: Is DosQ free? 
A: DosQ is, and will always be free. 
 
Q: Will this game be available on Linux? 
A: Maybe... I mean... maybe not. 
 
Q: How about Mac OS? 
A: No. 
 
Q: Android/iOS/Xbox/PlayStation? 
A: NO. 
 
Q: When is DosQ II coming out? 
A: Um... i don't know. 
 
Q: Do i need a supercomputer to run this? 
A: Not really. 
 
Q: Who's "darkxception"? 
A: I am darkxception.
